attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To protect the UK's vulnerable people the utility companies should be taken back from foreign ownership and nationalised under UK control in order  that prices can be held at affordable levels so that all british people can afford electricity, gas and water prices, which commodities are essential to every life in the UK and should be available to all without shareholder control of prices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
